divs: Sighting Detailsas we were driving home we looked up and saw lights in the sky it started off with about 6 lights and slowly they went away one by one. i posted a photo i tried to clear it up on instagram bc my phone has bad quality i was only ablt to get 3 lights since the others were disapearing. i lost sight of the object due to we had to go in the opposite direction of the lights.
